review: This  hotel is in a very quite area of Leh on Shanti Stupa road. The rooms and toilets are very very clean. The owners and staff are very polite and helping. Food was awesome.  In all, this is one of the best place to stay in Leh.
name: BAGESHREE S

review: We stayed here on 25th & 26th Jun2016. The hotel is bit away from the market place but surrounded by many other hotels. The rooms are maintained neat and clean. The owner is very helpful in all regards whose family also stay in the same place. He arranged a local trip in Leh and a 2 day trip to Nubra and Pangong, the driver and the vehicle are very good. The staff and food is good. The hotel is not big but you will feel homely.  Its peaceful and secure atmosphere.
name: jjrao2011
